domains.name: Algebra
domains.description: The study of mathematical symbols and the rules for manipulating them. From simple equations to abstract structures like groups and rings.
domains.flavor: The Golden Galaxy — where symbols dance and equations sing. Every mathematician's journey begins here.

domains.name: Analysis
domains.description: The rigorous study of limits, continuity, derivatives, integrals, and infinite series. The mathematics of change and approximation.
domains.flavor: The Blue Nebula — an infinite ocean of curves, converging and diverging in beautiful patterns.

domains.name: Geometry
domains.description: The study of shapes, sizes, positions, and properties of space. From Euclidean planes to curved manifolds.
domains.flavor: The Emerald Cluster — a crystalline realm where shapes and spaces reveal their hidden symmetries.

domains.name: Number Theory
domains.description: The queen of mathematics. The study of integers, primes, divisibility, and the deep patterns hidden in numbers.
domains.flavor: The Rose Spiral — ancient and mysterious, its prime stars are scattered in patterns no one fully understands.

domains.name: Probability & Statistics
domains.description: The mathematics of uncertainty. From the laws of chance to the science of drawing conclusions from data.
domains.flavor: The Dice Nebula — where randomness has rules and uncertainty is quantified with precision.

domains.name: Topology
domains.description: The study of properties preserved under continuous deformation. Stretching, bending, but never tearing or gluing.
domains.flavor: The Rubber Galaxy — where a coffee mug and a donut are one and the same.

domains.name: Combinatorics
domains.description: The mathematics of counting, arrangement, and selection. Discrete structures and their properties.
domains.flavor: The Mosaic Cluster — infinite arrangements of finite pieces, each pattern a story.

domains.name: Logic & Set Theory
domains.description: The foundations of mathematical reasoning. Formal systems, proofs, sets, and the limits of computation.
domains.flavor: The Axiom Core — the bedrock upon which all of mathematics is built.

domains.name: Discrete Mathematics
domains.description: The mathematics of countable structures. Algorithms, number systems, cryptography, and computational thinking.
domains.flavor: The Digital Frontier — where mathematics meets computation and powers the modern world.

domains.name: Differential Equations
domains.description: Equations involving derivatives. The language of change, modeling everything from orbits to epidemics.
domains.flavor: The Flux Streams — rivers of change flowing through every branch of science.

domains.name: Optimization
domains.description: Finding the best solution among many possibilities. Linear programming, convex optimization, and combinatorial optimization.
domains.flavor: The Summit Seekers — always climbing, always searching for the highest peak or deepest valley.

domains.name: Applied Mathematics
domains.description: Mathematics in action. Numerical methods, modeling, signal processing, machine learning, and information theory.
domains.flavor: The Workshop Galaxy — where abstract ideas become tools that shape the real world.

domains.name: Category Theory
domains.description: The mathematics of mathematics itself. Abstract structures, functors, and natural transformations that unify all fields.
domains.flavor: The Mirror Dimension — where you see not the objects, but the patterns between them.
